events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn't fit, and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a refund request following the customer's message about returning a product for money back.
Support agent Alice has been assigned to handle the refund case for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also confirm if the jacket is unused and still has all tags attached to qualify for a full refund?
Sure, my order number is 78541236. The jacket is brand new and I haven’t worn it outside; all tags are intact as well.
Thanks for the information. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and once we receive it, we will process your refund immediately.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this so quickly. I appreciate the prepaid label offer.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The money should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and you haven’t reported any further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our store!
